- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions
- [x] Compile the Project
- [x] Create and Run Task
- [x] Launch the Project
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

Execution Guidelines

- Use the todo list to track steps and mark them complete with summaries.
- Keep communication concise; skip command outputs unless needed.
- Use '.' as the working directory; avoid creating new folders unless requested.
- Only install extensions specified by project setup info; otherwise skip.
- If project details are missing, default to a Hello World starting point.
- Avoid adding non-required media or links; use placeholders only if noted.
- Follow folder creation and development rules provided in this file.
- Task is complete when the project scaffolds, compiles, README is current, and launch instructions are provided.
